mapper.select: SELECT t.IDNUM, t.SAMPLE_U_T_C , t.VIN , t.SHOP_NO , t.OPERATE_TYPE , t2.WAREHOUSE_CODE IN_WAREHOUSE_CODE , t2.WAREHOUSE_NAME IN_WAREHOUSE_NAME , t2.VWLCKDM FROM ods_vlms_base_station_data t LEFT JOIN dim_vlms_warehouse_rs t2 on t.SHOP_NO = t2.WAREHOUSE_CODE WHERE SAMPLE_U_T_C >= #{startDateStr} AND SAMPLE_U_T_C <= #{endDateStr} limit #{limitStart} , #{limitEnd};

SELECT IDNUM AS rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT t.*, t2.WAREHOUSE_CODE IN_WAREHOUSE_CODE, t2.WAREHOUSE_NAME IN_WAREHOUSE_NAME FROM ods_vlms_base_station_data t LEFT JOIN ods_vlms_rfid_warehouse t2 on t.SHOP_NO = t2.WAREHOUSE_CODE WHERE SAMPLE_U_T_C >= #{startDateStr} AND SAMPLE_U_T_C <= #{endDateStr} ) a limit #{limitStart} , #{limitEnd} ;
